metadata.name: Suspicious Regsvr32 Execution From Remote Share
metadata.comment: Detects REGSVR32.exe to execute DLL hosted on remote shares

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\regsvr32.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('\\\\regsvr32.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' \\\\')))

output.summary: Detects REGSVR32.exe to execute DLL hosted on remote shares
